resources.string: A minimum of 2 FULL fill-ups needed for showing something here.
Just one new full fill-up for a beautiful … dot here :)
Just one new full fill-up for showing a real chart.
Thank you for helping make AndiCar better!
Will be used to store the backup files. Should be a dedicated one.
Along with the database backup also send the GPS track files.
It will be used for sending the email with the backup file attached.
Show a notification on success. Regardless of this option, a notification will be shown if an error occurred.
Internet access required to configure this service.
This is a test email for account validation.
No file(s) selected. Nothing to delete.
No file(s) selected. Nothing to share.
Draft. Fill the arrival to complete it.
A new template, based on the current values, will be created.\n\nName:

Please visit https://sites.google.com/site/andicarfree/howto#TOC-Restore-your-data-from-secure-backup if you need to restore this backup.

Sent by AndiCar - http://www.andicar.org"
No car defined!\nGPS tracking cannot be started.
Bluetooth is disabled. Enable it to create a link.

Hi! Thank you for installing AndiCar.

 The first step to use this app is to enter your car / vehicle current info.

 If you had used AndiCar before, there is a possibility to restore the old data (if data backups exist).
Add, delete, modify conversions between measurement units
Add, delete, modify trip & expense types
Add, delete, modify default currency rates
Add, delete, modify gas stations, vendors and locations
Long pressing the add button will show the menu
Are you sure you want to delete the selected backup?
Are you sure you want to restore the selected backup? This action will replace your existing data!
Attention! This will replace your existing data with the data from the chosen backup!
Recommended. This service will create scheduled data backups.
Recommended. This service will automatically send the backups outside of your device. In this way, your recorded data will be available even if you lose your phone.
Choose the file format(s) used for the track
Your track files are located in %1$s folder
Automatically start the GPS Track Controller when a Bluetooth connection to a car is created.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected record?
More details in Settings -> Financial settings -> Gas stations …
No conversion rate defined for these UOMs
Your GPS is disabled!\n Please enable it.
GPS Service provider out of service!
Is alternative fuel vehicle (LPG, CNG, plug-in hybrid, etc.)

Alternative fuel vehicle support is a new feature. Please contact me at andicar.support@gmail.com if you find any issue or have some improvement tips.\n\nFuel efficiency/consumption info and some charts are not available for this type of vehicles.
Different starting time for each linked car
The starting time will be specified for each linked car
The starting mileage will be specified for each linked car
Long press on a car for more options
All active cars are linked to this task.
At least one car must be linked to this task.
No active car with current mileage smaller than the task mileage!\n Please increase the mileage of the task.
The starting time must be in the future!
Mileage frequency must be bigger than the reminder.
When a To-Do is marked as done, a new one will be automatically appended to the To-Do list.
not enough records for an estimated date
The backup was created with success
Here are your AndiCar backup file(s).
Your backup file has been sent.
A new template was created based on the current values.
Report creation in progress. Please wait…
The filter applies only to statistics and pie charts!

AndiCar is a free and open source software, licensed under the terms of the GNU General Public License.
See the About page for more details.
Copyright © 2010-%1$s Miklós Keresztes.
Thank you for using AndiCar!

AndiCar is a free and open source vehicle management software for Android powered devices. It is licensed under the terms of the GNU General Public License.

* For more information (how to, latest news, etc.) please visit the project home page at www.andicar.org.
Refresh the page in your browser if you get a \"Web page not available\" message.
* For questions you are welcome to the AndiCar discussion list at http://groups.google.com/group/andicar.
* For bug reports or enhancement requests do not hesitate to use the AndiCar issue system at https://github.com/mkeresztes/AndiCar/issues.
* The source code is available at https://github.com/mkeresztes/AndiCar.
* For other things you can send an email to andicar.support@gmail.com.

Credits:
* German translation by Frank Dreesbach - frank.dreesbach@mail.de (initial translation by Andy Haubenschmid)
* Hungarian translation by Péter Nagy - microbilab@gmail.com
* Spanish translation by Daniel Iozzi - danieliozzi@gmail.com
* Romanian translation by Doru Butnaru - budo8002@gmail.com

AndCar uses the following third party libraries:
* Droppy - https://github.com/shehabic/Droppy
* MPAndroidChart - https://github.com/PhilJay/MPAndroidChart
* Android-SwitchDateTimePicker - https://github.com/PhilJay/MPAndroidChart
* android-file-chooser - https://github.com/hedzr/android-file-chooser
* JavaMail for Android - https://javaee.github.io/javamail/Android

Copyright notice:
Copyright © 2010-%1$s Miklós Keresztes (miklos.keresztes@gmail.com)

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

Thank you for using AndiCar.
The start index is within an existing mileage
The stop index is within an existing mileage
New mileage overlap an existing mileage
The stop index must be greater than start index
This driver can not be deleted because it is used in mileage(s).
This driver can not be deleted because it is used in fill-up(s).
This car can not be deleted because it is used in mileage(s).
This car can not be deleted because it is used in fill-up(s).
This UOM can not be deleted because it is used in mileage(s).
This UOM can not be deleted because it is used in fill-up(s).
This UOM can not be deleted because it is used in UOM conversion(s).
This currency can not be deleted because it is used in car definition(s).
This currency can not be deleted because it is used in fill-up(s).
This expense type can not be deleted because it is used in mileage(s).
This expense type can not be deleted because it is used in fill-up(s).
The report folder (%1s) can not be created. You can not save the reports locally until you create this folder on your device.
The backup folder (%1s) can not be created. You can not backup your database until you create this folder on your device.
The UOM can not be inactivated because it is used in an active car definition."
The currency can not be inactivated because it is used in an active car definition.
This category can not be deleted because it is used in fill-up(s).
This category can not be deleted because it is used in expense(s).
The conversion rate is already defined between these currencies.
This expense can not be deleted because it was created by a fill-up.\n You should delete the fill-up.
You can not define conversion between the same UOMs.
You can not define conversion between the same currencies.
The GPS track folder (%1s) can not be created. You can not save the gps track files until you create this folder on your device.
Track file not found or is empty!
This currency can not be deleted because it is used in expense(s).
This driver can not be deleted because it is used in expense(s).
This car can not be deleted because it is used in expense(s).
This expense type can not be deleted because it is used in expense(s).
This partner can not be deleted because it is used in fill-up(s).
This partner can not be deleted because it is used in expense(s).
This location can not be deleted because it is used in fill-up(s).
This location can not be deleted because it is used in expense(s).
This tag can not be deleted because it is used in mileage(s).
This tag can not be deleted because it is used in fill-up(s).
This tag can not be deleted because it is used in expense(s).
This tag can not be deleted because it is used in gps track(s).
Temporary files folder (%1s) can not be created. You can not use the SecureBackup service until you create this folder on your device.
This type can not be deleted because it is used in task(s).
Unknown To-Do!\nProbably the task was modified and the To-Do list recreated.
This device does not have Bluetooth support!
I\'m sorry, but an unexpected error occurred :(
Cannot share. No application found with sharing capabilities.
Access denied to location. Grant it to use this feature!
Access denied to external storage. Grant it to use this feature!
Database file not found in the backup archive. Restore aborted.
The log folder (%1s) cannot be created.
Secure backup incomplete configured: no recipient email
Secure backup incomplete configured: no Google account chosen.
AndiCar is not authorized, or the authorization was removed, to send emails on your behalf. Secure backup was disabled. You can re-enable it from Settings -> Backup & Restore.
Please choose a value for from UOM!
Please choose a value for to UOM!
A minimum of 2 to-do record required!
Secure backup incomplete configured: no drive folder selected
Error while trying to upload the backup (%1s)
The selected drive resource (%1s) is not a folder!
The selected drive folder (%1s) was deleted!
The selected drive folder (%1s) is restricted!
Access denied to Google Drive. Open Settings -> Backup & Restore and try to revalidate your Google account.
Authentication error. Open Settings -> Backup & Restore and try to revalidate your Google account.
No network connection. Can\'t validate the account.
Out of memory error. Please switch the secure backup destination to Google Drive (Settings -> Backup & Restore).
This UOM can not be deleted because it is used in car definition(s).
